name: Jordan Mitchell
persona: Jordan is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 0.53. They tend to have low motivation and self-discipline when it comes to their studies and often find it difficult to set or pursue high academic goals. While Jordan does not experience much test anxiety, their low perseverance and lack of confidence in their abilities make it challenging to keep up with coursework. Jordan may benefit from academic support services and guidance to help develop better study habits and motivation.
